Posts.Content: Hello grandmap. . I'm 9 down with 6 to go. Slapping on moisturiser - from the chemist as the hosp didn't supply anything - twice daily and doing the physio exercises twice daily too. Boob a bit sore and looking mottled and slighter browner. Tiredness hit me like a sledgehammer yesterday! 10 hours sleep not enough and takes me all morning to get myself together. Fortunately got late afternoon appts. Roll on Saturday when it's all done. Good luck . L
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy club

Posts.Content: Oh, forgot to add... Find the vest tops in Primark - made out of a silky elastic type fabric really good. Cost Â£3 and are nice and soft against the skin and offer a bit of support. I'm a c cup and they're fine for me. Get them in black and then the ink markings don't show on your whites!!
